text: Masala (Spicy) Rice 1 Put mustard seeds in hot oil. Let them 'frizzle'. Add turmeric to get a yellow color.  Add onions. Fry till golden brown. Add the rice. Stir quickly as to prevent burning. Add salt and cook for 2-5 minutes, or until rice smells cooked. Stir to prevent burning. Garnish with lemon juice and/or coriander.  Serve hot. Serve with a side dish. For, example: Baingan Ka Bharta|eggplant side dish) or mango pickle. Masala (Spicy) Rice 2 Wash the rice (if needed). Boil 1 cup rice in a rice cooker and wait for 1 whistle (approximately 3 minutes). Add 1 tablespoon oil to the heavy-based frying pan.  Add the cumin and mustard seeds. Cook, and let them splutter. Add the chopped onions to the pan. Let them turn golden brown. Add the turmeric powder, red chilli powder,and coriander powder. Mix well. Add the chopped potatoes to the pan.  Wait for about 2 minutes. Then, add the boiled rice to the pan. Sprinkle in 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of water. Simmer the gas or heat. Cook for about 2-3 minutes. Serve hot.
